lead_paragraph: Combining his usual strong ball-striking with efficient putting, Boo Weekley shot a five-under-par 65 to take the first-round lead in the Stanford St. Jude Championship in Memphis. He closed with a birdie on No. 18 to move a stroke ahead of Tommy Armour III.
